thread.title: Insurance cheats cost households £90 a year as bogus claims reach record high
thread.title_full: Insurance cheats cost households £90 a year as bogus claims reach record high

author: Kate Palmer
title: Insurance cheats cost households £90 a year as bogus claims reach record high
text: Insurance Insurance cheats cost households £90 a year as bogus claims reach record high False claims on car, travel and home insurance have increased to £1.32bn annually – but the level of undiscovered fraud could be far higher Insurers recovered £1.32bn in fake claims last year, with the motor insurance attracting the biggest proportion of fraud
